Review from amazon:

By Eleanor White on June 8, 2010

"Carol Rutz' "A Nation Betrayed" should be required reading for high school juniors or seniors.

Today's citizens need to know how crucially important it is that citizens exercise their sovereign responsibilities and keep government on a very short leash. When citizens "leave important things to the best qualified," you get situations like the brutal MKULTRA torture of children, described in detail by Carol Rutz, who survived this horror story.

NEVER trust government platitudes. Demand transparency and accountability. Don't be fooled by pleasing personalities who look good on camera. I'm not recommending a witch hunt, just straightforward alertness, with stories like Carol's in the back of your mind. The "national security" excuse covered up Carol's torture and those of other MKULTRA era experimentees.

Reading this book is an excellent first step in restoring the power of government to those who rightly own it - the people!"
